body: A Queens man already in custody on charges of robbery and sodomy was charged with the sexual assault and strangulation of a bank worker last month. The suspect, Chris Aniades, 23 years old, was in the Queens House of Detention when he was charged with abducting Doreen Vitale on Oct. 15 and killing her. Miss Vitale's nude body was found in the back
title: The City; The Police Blotter
